comment._content: Her wikipedia entry (Beatrice Mills Forbes, 8th Countess of Granard): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beatrice_Forbes,_Countess_of_Granard

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This picture appears on the front page of the Bisbee daily review., September 15, 1915. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84024827/1915-09-15/ed-... She was in the news when her husband resigned his post as Master of the King's Horse to go to the front with the Royal Irish regiment.
